Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Peeps
Reviews.Content: Got it fast phone works great really happy with it  got it activated no problem at all  thanks so much.

Reviews.Title: verizon lg venus
Reviews.Author: heather
Reviews.Content: i got this phone a month ago and i loved it untill it fell apart on me it came apart where it was put on the sliding piece and when i looked at both sides it had major rust where it holds together and was filled with dust so i can no longer use it at all this is honestly the worst refurbished phone i have ever seen and owned

Reviews.Title: cell phone
Reviews.Author: fair
Reviews.Content: Cell phone built like a tank.  I made sure it comes on and does what it is supposed to do.  It was used and needed a battery and didn't text.  They immediately made these thing right, even sending a return envelope.  Great business.
